                     java.lang.String[] recordTitles,
                     int[] recordImages,
                     java.lang.String[] recordDates,
                     java.lang.String[] recordComments)
        Creates a custom adapter for takes in array containing record details
        Parameters:
        context - the context for the adapter
        recordTitles - the title of the record
        recordImages - the images to be attached to the record
        recordDates - the datestamp of the record
        recordComments - the comments attached to the record
